desc: Pittsburgh's oldest Occult Shop specializing in the Arts Magickal! Now available online.

layout.text:
Hocus Pocus is Pittsburgh's oldest Occult Gift Shop specializing in the Arts Magickal for over 23 years! Located in the heart of Pittsburgh's Oakland neighborhood -- since 1998!
We are located at...
113 Meyran Ave - Pgh, PA 15213
412.622.0113
HOURS: Mon to Sat from 12 to 5 PM
PLEASE NOTE: MASKS ARE STILL HIGHLY ENCOURAGED, BUT NO LONGER REQUIRED IN THE STORE DURING YOUR VISIT! If your are sick or have recently been sick, please do not visit the store. Feel free to use our curbside pickup or mailing options if needed. Complimentary masks are still available if you would like to wear one during your visit & forgot your own mask. Staff are vaxed & boosted, plus we will still wear masks.
We are still limiting occupancy within our store to 8 customers at one time. If you arrive & we are at max occupancy, we have chairs outside for you to wait. Wait times are typically under 5-10 minutes.
MORE ITEMS ARE BEING ADDED TO THIS SITE ALL THE TIME!
Add your name to our Newsletter List to receive updates.
